channel.title: Help on Playing Moparscape [Make more people play by letting me]
channel.description:
Well,i need help because i found out that you GUYS ARE GOOD at servers etc, well, i need help with playing moparscape (im not a n00b its just i have 2 comps and only 1 has it.) Well, ive downloaded moparscape and when i try and get on it says: Do you want to open or save this file? Name: Moparscape.jar Type: Compressed (zipped) folder, 532KB From: C:\Program Files\MoparScape
Options: Open, Save, Cancel.
--------------------------------------------------- I Clicked 'Open' And Tryed 'Save' Open: Takes me to another option saying Do you want to save this file Options: Save, Cancel.
Save: Just saves it...
Downloaded: Only Moparscape.
Need to download: JAVA Sun, Need Link. WinRAR
Please help =(* And if you say download those, please give me the link to them.
Thanks +)
